attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! Worst app ever
attributes.review: Literally makes your phone glitch like crazy!! And I think it hacks your phone too, and all of a sudden this Cheeto looking man started showing up on all my platforms and apps as soon as I downloaded it!!! My eyes BURNNNNN😭 I really love Cheetos but that one is for sure expired & rotten.🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app caused radiation. When ever I open it my phone glows and shakes violently. I think this harming my health. I can no longer see and have been told by my friends I my skin has developed a grey scaley coat, I think I’m becoming a cave lizard 🦈🦎. If you care at all about your health DO NOT OPEN THIS APP.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!! 😡👎
attributes.review: I wanted to get this app because I was a BIG fan of that orange guy with the blonde hair💖, but as soon as I opened the app I was greeted by these straight weirdos🙄. Ugh I was so disgusted 👎by this I HAD to do something!! So gross 🤢 I hope these guys get help soon 💅! Also my cat hisses every time I open the app 😤😾👈she gets it💖

attributes.title: No🤩
attributes.review: This app is awful!!!! As soon as I opened the app I received news that my cat had gotten ran over! Then my wife left me and took the kids to go live with her sister in California. CALIFORNIA??? THATS WHERE THE LIBTARDS LIVE!!! This is unexceptable and the trump administration made a mistake by making this app! Just awful.

attributes.title: This app is a disgrace
attributes.review: I downloaded it hoping for a quaint, non racist, little community and immediately I realized that this president and his followers are all white supremacists who want to take away lgbt rights, put kids in cages at the border, and defund all healthcare so the poor cant get any help. Disgusting. I am truly scarred.

attributes.title: Wrinkles all over his body
attributes.review: I found him fighting with a grizzly and then he screamed “ HELP DA BEAR 🤬😾” but I didn’t because he needs to bathe he had wrinkles all over his face and his booty crack was showing take this app off of the Apple store for clear skin and tell Donald trump to bathe at 1-800 because that’s beyond me 😾😸!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: As soon I opened the app I got a virus in my phone and my phone got flooded with picture of Michel Jackson! I have a phobia of him and I now have major ptsd from even thinking about it! I now have to go to the therapist every day! Trump should have to pay my bills!

attributes.title: this app will make you sick (literally)
attributes.review:
i downloaded the app to see what donald trump could possibly need his own APP for. however, as soon as i opened the app a picture of an old orange with hair all over it came up and it made me sick. i threw up from disgust. 

WARNING: DO NOT DOWNLOAD APP OR ELSE YOU WILL SEE GROSS IMAGES AND HAVE THE POSSIBILITY OF GETTING SICK AS WELL.

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review:
This app is terrible. Even if they make the appropriate changes it was so bad I’ll never go back. There will never be a need for an app with this type of content. I should have read the other reviews before I got it! 
Biden 2020

attributes.title: It’s gonna be a no from me…
attributes.review: This app needs to be banned now!!! Not only was there a scary hairless orangutan prancing around being racist, but he was the leader of a cult! Yes I said it! A cult! How in the world does anyone allow this to happen!! And he has racist dumb orangutan cult followers! What a scary time to be alive. Remove this app IMMEDIATELY!
